job description:
Our innovative client in the Austin area is seeking a Linux Data Center Engineer to join their dedicated team.

This is an exciting full-time, permanent hire position!

Responsibilities of the Linux Data Center Engineer:
  • Assist in the management of several thousand VM servers in an Active Directory environment; ensure AD environment is highly available
  • Contribute to the configuration, layout, and performance tuning of the production infrastructure
  • Work with application engineers to develop Disaster Recovery application architecture
  • Support upgrade and go-live activities related to new customer onboarding projects
  • Attend and actively participate in weekly meetings
  • Participate in collaborative projects with predetermined timelines
  • Remediate vulnerabilities identified through internal audits utilizing provided tools
  • Create and update existing documentation of processes and procedures in support of administration tasks
  • Participate in rotating 24x7 on call support coverage for data center related issues
  • Ensure that all activities are performed in accordance with security, availability, confidentiality and privacy policies and controls
Requirements of the Linux Data Center Engineer:
  • Bachelors degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience
  • At least 4 years of directly relevant experience
  • Ability to use professional concepts to solve a variety of problems
  • Ability to work on problems of diverse scope
  • Ability to exercise sound judgment within defined procedures to determine appropriate course of action
  • Strong organizational and multitasking skills
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic work environment
  • Solid knowledge and troubleshooting of Windows Server 2008/2012
  • Significant knowledge and troubleshooting of Linux operating systems, particularly Red Hat or CentOS
  • Advanced knowledge and troubleshooting of Microsoft Active Directory and Group Policy
  • Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Internet Information Services and/or NGINX websites
Keywords: Data Center Engineer, Linux, Active Directory, AD, Windows Server, Linux Red Hat, Linux CentOS, Group Policy
